plugins.name: Time
plugins.description: Display Date and Time with Digital and Analog Clocks.

functions.name: Digital Clock
functions.description: Display time within the Text component with a given format and timezone.

options.text: (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius

parameters.title: Format
parameters.description:
Example formats: 
YYYY-MM-DD (2024-01-16)
MMMM DDD YY (January Thu 24)
h:mm TT (6:33 AM)
HH:mm:ss (15:48:59)

Available elements:
YYYY (2024) 4 digit year 
YY (24) 2 digit year
Y (2024) Full Year 

MMMM (January - December) Full month name
MMM (Jan - Dec) Short month name
MM (02) Two digits month
M (2) Full digits month

DDDD (Monday - Sunday) Full day name
DDD (Mon - Sun) Short day name
DD (09) Two digits date
D (9) Full digits date

HH (17) 24 hours format two digits
H (Full 24 hours format)
hh (05) 12 hours foramt two digits
h (5) Full 12 hours format

mm (05) Two digits minutes
m (5) Full minutes

ss (06) Two digits seconds
s (6) Full digits seconds

TT (AM : PM)
T (A:P)
tt (am:pm)
t (a:p)

K +01:00 Current timezone

options.text: (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius

parameters.title: Format
parameters.description:
Available elements:
cY Total years remaining
cMM Total months remaining
cM (0-11) Months Remaining
cDD Total days remaining
cD (0-30) Days remaining
chh Total hours remaining
ch (0-23) Hours remaining
cmm Total minutes remaining
cm (0-59) Minutes remaining
css Total seconds remaining
cs (0-59) Seconds remaining

options.text: (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius
